name: Ocular HUD
desc: Gain +100% Critical Strike Chance for 8 seconds.
notes:
The Ocular HUD is an equipment in Risk of Rain 2.
While activated, the player gets the {  Full Crit status for 8 seconds, giving them +100% critical strike chance.


== Tips ==
This item can help activate  Predatory Instincts,  Harvester's Scythe, and more rarely  Shatterspleen obtained early in a run when the player has minimal critical strike chance.
The attack speed buff from  War Horn is quite helpful for getting the most use out of these items as well, and one stack lasts exactly as long as the HUD does.
Collecting  Fuel Cells and  Gestures of the Drowned, it is possible to gain 100% uptime on the guaranteed critical strikes. While usually more difficult than collecting 9 or 10  Lens-Maker's Glasses, it allows a player to run  Lost Seer's Lenses without losing use of items that rely on critical strikes.
The HUD is somewhat less useful for   Bandit, as his passive   Backstab makes it irrelevant if the player is skilled enough to get behind enemies.
  Railgunner's   Magnetic Accelerator turns the +100% critical strike chance into +100% critical strike damage when used.
